thread.title: Write Marketing Corp reviewed by Ella James
thread.title_full: Write Marketing Corp reviewed by Ella James

author: Ella James
title: Write Marketing Corp reviewed by Ella James
text:
We hired Write Marketing Corp to provide us logo, branding, email marketing plus social media marketing & design services & we couldn't be happier. This well deserved 5 star rating agency have generated us an additional $13,754 in revenue every month for their email marketing services alone plus ensures every campaign is highly valuable to our subscribers specifically ensuring we only deliver newsletters specifically providing their exact business's advised goals & topics most seeking help with.
This costs us just $299/month for custom newsletter design, copywriting, SEO, analytics, monthly strategy sessions + coaching 7 days a week dedicated account manager, delivering us a huge 4600% return on investment consistently every month.
I highly recommend Write Marketing Corp to any business or individual seeking results guaranteed services, high quality work, fast results, excellent value for money, and amazing 24/7 customer support.
